programme.title: The Blackest Questions With Dr. Christina Greer
programme.sub-title: Experiences, Advice and Photography With Expert World Traveler Jessica Nabongo
programme.desc: The first Black woman to visit every country on the planet shares her stories when world traveler Jessica Nabongo joins Dr. Christina Greer to dish on her favorite places, share travel advice and test her geography knowledge.
